name: How to Make a GameDev
description:
What does it mean to be the ultimate game dev?

Work on your game, or make a new friend? Fix the Z fighting, or walk the dog?

Live your life within these two isometric walls, and work on your first indie game. Make decisions to progress, and see how your game - and you - change. 

Platformer Controls:

  • Arrow Keys, Spacebar to Jump

A 48-hour game jam game by 

  • Sienna Blumstengel
  • Lucas Cardoso
  • Brandon Duncan, and
  • Dylan Gedig
